definition: (of an animal) appearance or color of coat

hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])

sentences.english: Agood horse cannot be of a bad colour.
A good horse cannot be of a bad color.
A man once bought a brilliantly-coloured parrot.
sentences.chinese: 從前，有人買了一隻毛色鮮豔的鸚鵡。

sentences.english: Pudong White pig is the only one Chinese indigenous pig breed with full white hair color.
sentences.chinese: 浦東白豬是國內唯一一個毛色全白的地方豬種。

sentences.english: Color is red and light, aggressive temperament, and full of character, it inherited the Jing Jing's advantages.
sentences.chinese: 毛色紅亮，性情兇悍，獒氣十足，繼承了京京的優點。

sentences.english: The shaded silver is one of the oldest ASH colors.
sentences.chinese: 陰影銀是美國短毛貓最早的毛色之一。

sentences.english: Predominantly white with black or black-and-tan markings, fox terriers are noted for their bold, energetic nature.
sentences.chinese: 毛色以白色爲主，帶黑或黑棕褐花斑點。

sentences.english: A good horse cannot constitute a boffer colour.

definition: white hair (of animals)/see also 白髮|白发[bai2 fa4]

pinyin: A1 la1 si1 jia1 xue3 qiao1 quan3
Su1 ge2 lan2 mu4 yang2 quan3
